ingredients.ingredient: 3 pounds beef eye of round roast
¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper

cookingTips: Let the roast come to room temperature before cooking for more even doneness
Use a meat thermometer to avoid overcooking—eye of round is a lean cut
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a simple seasoning approach for roast beef. Do you know the target internal temperature for your preferred doneness level?
